item.title: IShowSpeed Undergoing Eye Surgery
item.description:
Summary

  • IShowSpeed is undergoing surgery on his right eye to address a lingering infection.
  • IShowSpeed first experienced issues with his eye during a trip to Japan in 2023, experiencing excruciating headaches and vision troubles.
  • IShowSpeed has grown into one of YouTube's biggest sensations, expanding his brand beyond the platform into real-world appearances.

Popular YouTube content creator IShowSpeed is undergoing right eye surgery to treat an infection that first plagued the beloved YouTuber in 2023. IShowSpeed has become an online sensation on both YouTube and Twitch for his bombastic, positive personality and the wide variety of his content from travel vlogs to gaming commentary and more. IShowSpeed's success on YouTube has seen the creator grow his brand far beyond his humble streaming roots, appearing on broadcasts for the WWE and UEFA Champion's League. Now, however, the streamer is addressing a health issue that first arose two years ago.

During a trip to Japan in 2023, IShowSpeed first started showing symptoms of his ailment with excessive swelling in his right eye. The YouTube streamer would quickly learn that the condition was related to a dangerous sinus infection, with IShowSpeed being hospitalized and being told that the incident could have permanently impacted his vision. He reportedly experienced excruciating headaches and numbness in his face, though he continued to upload update videos for his massive fanbase. Now, IShowSpeed is undergoing surgery nearly two years after the initial incident.

As reported by Dexerto, a recent update confirms that IShowSpeed has chosen to undergo surgery on his eye to address the lingering issue. Not many details were shared about the details of the hospitalization or surgery IShowSpeed will be receiving, with the update posted by Twitter account Complex Pop Culture. The initial incident with IShowSpeed did not result in any lasting damage to his eye at the time, though the new surgery suggests that he may have started to experience issues again. IShowSpeed did not share an official update about his condition on his Twitter account.

IShowSpeed Undergoing Surgery on his Right Eye

IShowSpeed's recent surgery will see many of his fans wishing for the best for the iconic streamer. IShowSpeed's previous hospitalization in Japan saw the content creator surpass a major channel milestone, passing 19 million subscribers on YouTube. IShowSpeed's fanbase on YouTube has nearly doubled in the two years since his Japan trip, with the content creator now boasting a staggering 36.7 million subscribers. IShowSpeed has even leveraged his popularity into massive real-world events, including plans for IShowSpeed to go on a month-long tour of Africa in 2025.

IShowSpeed's YouTube success has seen the content creator often looking to break new ground for YouTube and Twitch stars. The streamer revealed earlier this year that he had received permission to stream all of popular anime One Piece through his YouTube channel, intending to watch along with viewers. IShowSpeed's love for One Piece also led to the creator expressing his desire to meet with One Piece 's creator, Eiichiro Oda, during a recent stream. Fans of IShowSpeed can hope that the streamer will see a swift recovery and finally close the book on his harrowing eye troubles.

item.title: Dragon Ball Fighting Game Tier List
item.description:
Quick Links

  • S-Tier Dragon Ball Fighting Games
  • A-Tier Dragon Ball Fighting Games
  • B-Tier Dragon Ball Fighting Games
  • C-Tier Dragon Ball Fighting Games

Dragon Ball sits near the top of shonen anime and manga, if not on the very throne itself. When it comes to influence over the shonen genre as a whole, Dragon Ball may only be surpassed by members of the Big Three or perhaps Fist of the North Star . Of course, the sheer magnitude of Dragon Ball 's success as a franchise extends not only to anime and manga, but to the world of gaming as well.

Although the term originates as a descriptor for a target demographic, shonen can also be understood as shorthand for battle manga. This shorthand is largely thanks to Dragon Ball itself, which was one of the earliest shonen manga series to generate massive popularity among international audiences. Thanks to the action-packed sagas found within the pages of Dragon Ball , it's no surprise that fighting games would prove to be the perfect genre for an adaptation.

Dragon Ball has earned plenty of video game adaptations over the years, but its fighting games have often proven the most popular. Many titles within Dragon Ball 's fighting game history can be organized into either the Budokai Tenkaichi or Xenoverse series, although there are exceptions to every rule. Regardless, many of these titles hold drastically different priorities from one another, and can be appropriately judged along those lines.

Tiers

Dragon Ball Fighting Games

S

Dragon Ball Fighterz, Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero

A

Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 3, Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2

B

Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 2, Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi

C

Dragon Ball Xenoverse, Dragon Ball Legends

S-Tier Dragon Ball Fighting Games

Although a tier list is subjective by nature, there's very little dispute when it comes to the title of best Dragon Ball fighting game. Dragon Ball Fighterz pushed the limits of how anime art styles could be translated into a video game, and injected new life into a fighting game community which was desperately struggling at the time. Fighterz sits at the perfect cross-section between casual Dragon Ball fans and competitive fighting game fans, which helps it pull ahead of its competitors that mostly appeal to one group or the other.

Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero is currently the most recent game on this list, and just so happens to also be one of the best. Sparking Zero is a direct continuation of the beloved Budokai Tenkaichi series, and does the impossible by nearly outdoing these classic titles. It would be more objective to state that Sparking Zero has updated the series for the modern day, and that is an impressive feat in its own right. Sparking Zero is hardly designed for tournament play, but the sheer content density on display is second to none.

A-Tier Dragon Ball Fighting Games

The Budokai Tenkaichi series has become practically synonymous with classic Dragon Ball games. Although each version has its own merits, Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 3 stands atop of the pyramid for good reason. Between its roster size and story content, Budokai Tenkaichi 3 remains nearly unmatched to this day. Even with Sparking Zero surpassing Budokai Tenkaichi 3 in a few ways, Tenkaichi 3 's approach to What Ifs remains unchallenged by its successor.

As much as the Budokai Tenkaichi series has been responsible for the image of classic Dragon Ball games, Xenoverse holds an equally iron grip over the franchise's modern forays into gaming. Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 is equal parts fighting game and expansive RPG, and uses its time-travel premise to create original chapters of iconic stories. Xenoverse 2 is still receiving new content with every new Dragon Ball project that is released, which helps Xenoverse 2 stay as fresh as any other game on this list.

B-Tier Dragon Ball Fighting Games

Considering it was released only a year after the first game, one would be shocked at how much Dragon Ball Z : Budokai Tenkaichi 2 improved on the series' formula. Budokai Tenkaichi 2 contains double the content of its predecessor, and helped to deepen battle mechanics significantly. In fact, Budokai Tenkaichi 2 and Budokai Tenkaichi 3 both contain features the other lacks. This makes Budokai Tenkaichi 2 well worth a revisit, and doubles as the reason many could even rank it above Budokai Tenkaichi 3 .

Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi barely falls short by comparison. Still, there's no doubt that it laid a foundation that nearly every subsequent Dragon Ball game would follow. Including 64 characters and 10 stages on a first outing is no small task, and Budokai Tenkaichi can even be credited for inventing What Ifs, which help developers to include stories that can still surprise players despite their general familiarity with Dragon Ball 's best story arcs.

C-Tier Dragon Ball Fighting Games

When compared to its competition, Dragon Ball Xenoverse drew the short end of the stick. There's simply very little reason to return to the title anymore, as it was outdone by Xenoverse 2 only one year after its release. In simpler terms, Xenoverse walked so Xenoverse 2 could run. Xenoverse can still be upheld for introducing so many concepts and mechanics that have been developed by its sequel, but there's no doubt that the underdevelopment of its gameplay could be felt if one were to take Xenoverse out for a spin today.

Dragon Ball Legends isn't a bad game by any means, it simply can't compete with its peers on this list. Although it is billed as a fighting game alongside the rest, it is equal parts a card battler. Combined with the limitations inherent to a free-to-play mobile game, Legends lacks the mechanical depth found in the many expansive fighting games developed throughout Dragon Ball 's history.

How to Redeem Codes in King Legacy

To redeem codes in Roblox: King Legacy , players must follow a few quick steps. To obtain some of the latest supplies from codes, they should input them correctly by copying and pasting the list provided. If a code doesn't work, they should double-check that the spelling is correct. If it still doesn't work, it has likely been redeemed or is no longer available.

  1. Launch King Legacy
  2. Click on the Settings button in the drop-down menu
  3. In the Settings window, click inside the Enter Code box and paste the code
  4. Click Enter to complete the process

King Legacy Tips and Tricks

To begin with, it is necessary to understand that players who want to achieve success must complete many quests. Players can find them in the city. A very important aspect of the game is the selection of enemies by level. Initially, it will be difficult for players to deal with enemies of a higher level, so choose carefully. Using additional skills such as Smash is also very important for victory.

Best Anime Roblox Games Like King Legacy

With thousands of Roblox games available, players often search for something new. The reason for this is that all games get dull over time, and this section aims to help players if and when this occurs. Below, they will find a list of the best Roblox games, like King Legacy :

  • Project Slayers
  • Anime Adventures
  • Shindo Life
  • Ro Ghoul
  • Zo Samurai

About the King Legacy Developers

King Legacy was created by a group of developers called Venture Lagoons. They are pretty popular, and their group on the Roblox website currently has 621K members. Unfortunately, King Legacy is the only game from these developers that is so popular.

item.title: Roblox: UGC Limited Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
UGC Limited is one of the few Roblox experiences that is not just a game for your entertainment, but a useful tool for marketing and sharing your creativity. Here, Roblox creators can generate their own codes that other players can redeem to get access to specific, limited-edition items.

We, in turn, have collected some cool UGC Limited codes that you can use to buy new cosmetic items. So, if you want to change your image but want more unique and rare things, this is one of the best options.

Updated March 16, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: UGC Limited codes allow players to unlock exclusive user-generated content within the game. These rewards may include cosmetics, accessories, or other customization options. Because they are often time-sensitive, it’s best to redeem them as soon as they become available.

All UGC Limited Codes

Working UGC Limited Codes

  • MP - Redeem this code to get Alt Defenders = Mid plate.
  • DRP - Redeem this code to get a Blue Card.
  • TRP - Redeem this code to get a Water Bar.
  • 876 - Redeem this code to get a Blue Hood.
  • TOD - Redeem this code to get a Health Bar.
  • RIP - Redeem this code to get a Tiger Head.
  • LKY - Redeem this code to get a Green Sword.
  • R3DD - Redeem this code to get a Red Scythe.
  • NYAW - Redeem this code to get a Blue Hat with Horns
  • 404 - Redeem this code to get a Blue Item
  • RIP - Redeem this code to get a Tiger Hat
  • HDN - Redeem this code to get a Dragon Hat
  • SWD - Redeem this code to get Blue Hood
  • 707 - Redeem this code to get Purple Antlers
  • rainglowb - Redeem this code to get Sapphire War Axe
  • Gel - Redeem this code to get Purple Devil Horns
  • DISCORD.GG/CAC - Redeem this code to get Messy Summer Boy Hair
  • ANOTHERCODEWOOO - Redeem this code to get Messy Y2K
  • THANKYOUGUYS - Redeem this code to get Hair
  • REDVALK - Redeem this code to get Reevalk Decal
  • RAINBOW - Redeem this code to get Rainglowb.
  • SKULL - Redeem this code to get Skull.
  • TRICKORTREAT - Redeem this code to get Trick Or Treat Head.
  • THISISAINFSTOCKJAMCODE - Redeem this code to get Jam Fedora.
  • Headphones - Redeem this code to get Cat Burger Pods.
  • Tie - Redeem this code to get Tie.
  • Hat - Redeem this code to get The Neon Tophat of Doom.
  • Cowboy Hat - Redeem this code to get Max.
  • Roblox - Redeem this code to get Star Shades.
  • Poke - Redeem this code to get Purple Noir Valkyrie.
  • Doom - Redeem this code to get Relaxing Pepper.
  • Love - Redeem this code to get Hammer of Friends.
  • Shock - Redeem this code to get DartSky’s Top Hat.

Expired UGC Limited Codes

Currently, there are no expired UGC Limited codes, so redeem the active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for UGC Limited

Just like in most other Roblox games, redeeming UGC Limited codes is not difficult, and it is just one of the few actions you can do here. However, if you encounter any difficulties or something doesn't work properly, follow these instructions to figure out what to do:

  • Launch UGC Limited .
  • Pay attention to the top of the screen. There will be a button that says UGC CODES. Click on it.
  • This will open a new menu. There will be two big buttons. Among them, interact with the second one, which says Redeem Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a white Redeem button below it. Now, enter manually or, better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the white Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification “Code successfully redeemed” and the limited UGC will appear on your screen.

How to Get More UGC Limited Codes

To find more Roblox codes, you'll need to follow creators who use UGC Limited as a tool to promote their UGC. Considering that the audience engagement in this experience is quite high, you can easily find a content maker whose stuff you like and get a code, or become a UGC creator yourself and share it with others.

item.title: Roblox: Investor City Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Investor City Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Investor City
  • How to Get More Investor City Codes

Investor City is a Roblox tycoon that will test your capitalist abilities, and the main goal here is to buy and rent houses. It can be quite difficult at first, but as soon as you earn your first Cash, you can quickly reinvest it and get a steady income.

Apart from that, you can also redeem Investor City codes that will bring you tons of Cash in seconds. The rewards from the codes will be useful for all players, especially if you are a beginner, so hurry up.

Updated March 16, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Investor City codes provide you with boosts, allowing you to build and expand your investments faster. Keep an eye out for new codes that may appear with game updates. And to make your coming back easier, bookmark this guide.

All Investor City Codes

Working Investor City Codes

  • cxznipq2oe - Redeem this code to get three Luck Boosts. (NEW)
  • fglkdsn225 - Redeem this code to get five Ultra Luck Boosts. (NEW)
  • 12kmcxj182 - Redeem this code to get Freebies.
  • fxyuz9345a - Redeem this code to get two Luck Boosts.
  • BetaRelease - Redeem this code to get 20,000 Cash.
  • MoreMoneyPlease - Redeem this code to get two Income Boosts.
  • Lucky - Redeem this code to get two Luck Boosts.
  • MegaLucky - Redeem this code to get Ultra Luck Boosts.

Expired Investor City Codes

There are currently no expired Investor City codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Keeping track of all the renters, paying off property debts, and growing your business in Investor City is not easy. So, to make this task a little bit easier, be sure to use Investor City codes.

How to Redeem Codes for Investor City

Redeeming Investor City codes doesn't take much time and can be done in a few clicks. If you have not had a similar experience in other Roblox games before, here is a step-by-step guide:

  • Launch Investor City .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. Here, under the currency counter, you'll find the Settings button. Click on it.
  • This will open the Settings menu. At the bottom, you will see an input field and a white Redeem button, this is the redemption section. Now, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned working codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the white Redeem button to send a request for rewards.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Investor City Codes

The more active a game's community is, the more often its developers share new Roblox codes. In the case of Investor City , the developers often share new codes on the game's official pages, so here are links to all of them so you can look for freebies yourself:

  • Official Investor City Roblox group.
  • Official Investor City game page.
  • Official Investor City Discord server.
